song_lyrics: Jayantī āī khushiyā lāī, gūnj ūṭhī shahenāī,
Mangal gīt gāte he dekho, harakh rahe manmāhī
Āī re āī janma jayantī āj,
Ḍhol bajāvo re, khushīme gāvo re...
Mastime sab zūmo nācho re... ḍhol
Hīre aur motī ke shrīngār sajāvo,
Sab mīlakar fīr pūjan kar lo āj... ḍhol
Khūshī ki ye bāt ghar ghar pahochāvo,
Charaṇome sab vandan kar lo āj... ḍhol
Bhakto ko bulāvo sang santo ko bulāvo,
Zūm zūm gāvo Pramukh Swāmī ko rīzāvo,
Guru mangal guru ke guṇ gāye āj... ḍhol
title: Āī re āī janma jayantī āj

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-3057: Sadhu Gurumangaldas

Category: Pramukh Swami Maharajna Pad
